about_the_game:
This music album is directly related to the game franchise "Stars And Empires".
The music can be found in the actual game and is all hand crafted by the games creator himself "Bill McCarthy" who can also be found on Spotify or any other major online music store for his other music. If you want to help support his work, feel free to pickup your album here or on any online music store.
He has made over 200 songs that are already available so feel free to browse them all!
This album "Stars And Empires: Colony Defense, The Soundtrack" was composed specifically for the game Stars and Empires.
Bill believes in providing quality music that helps inspire the listener in whatever it is they need inspiration for. He makes music of various styles and genres but usually focuses on the electronica/orchestrated/soundtrack genres.
If you want to know more about the music or the game, feel free to follow on social media or join the discord channels!

This album has several songs ranging from chill vibes to upfront and full of action. It explores all types of different sounds and incorporates many different genres ranging from hip-hop, techno, orchestrated, trap and even tribal genres and sounds. The album tries to capture the essence of the Stars And Empires overall vibe as well as its massive storyline, arrangement of characters and personal brand. In short, you're in for a ride, so buckle up!
